name: Cheetahs Are Meant To Be Fast
name_original: Cheetahs Are Meant To Be Fast
description:
#GainJam2021 entry (and WINNER)!

An interactive storybook by Khatoblepas and UrgUrgUrg about how being a fat guy who eats a lot is very morally wrong and not at all awesome or attractive.

Please enjoy and absorb it's important lessons!

**DOWNLOAD MIRROR**

http://hy3na.net/Games/CAMTBF/CheetahsAreMeantToBeFast.zip

**PLAYING ON IOS/ANDROID/OTHERS**

Being an #AdventureGameStudio engine game, this can be played through the fantastic ScummVM emulator.

**CREDITS**

WRITTEN & DEVELOPED BY

UrgUrgUrg & Khatoblepas

LEAD ARTIST

Khatoblepas

VOICES

Vmoartet as Chet the Cheetah

Norman Rafferty as Ricky the Rhino

Momochilla as Rachel the Rat

HelluvaLoonatic as Pendleton the Penguin

Meg Molloy Tuten as The Narrator

**Audio credits and such to be added later**

SHAMELESS PLUG

If you like this game you might lke the last project me and Khato worked on together, Terror Of The Vampire - a non-kink (but still Chubby Animal Boy-heavy) gothic horror-comedy!
